topic.title: THE IncaKoin 1% STRATEGY
topic.body:
Buy 1% of the total coins available (or whatever percentage you are able to hold and support).

IncaKoins gain +9% more coins every 35 days proof of stake mined, with the maximum increase at 90 days.
Be certain to stake mine the coins on schedule to keep and hold your percentage of the network while the coin base expands.

Hold a relative value of Bitcoin (specifically for NKA support) to ensure your 1% of the network has some support behind it.

Buy more coins beyond that 1% you hold, buy them at support levels.

Sell those extra coins to the public on paper wallets, buy Bitcoin with the money, and add it to support levels, repeat over and over.

Place small amounts of those coins for sale at each sell price level, and as they sell, add that Bitcoin back to support price levels below, until those price level hold.


Find others who wish to stake mine and hold 1% of the network, there are only 100 possible “1%”s for sale of course.

Find IncaKoin on 
https://www.cryptopia.co.nz/

Contact nkacrypto (at) gmail.com
